title: Pipeline Execution Trend
description: Day-wise pipeline execution trend showing succeeded and failed counts

successCount.description: Number of successful pipeline executions on this date

failedCount.description: Number of failed pipeline executions on this date

pendingCount.description: Number of pending pipeline executions on this date

skippedCount.description: Number of skipped pipeline executions on this date

totalCount.description: Total number of pipeline executions on this date
